'''Alhaitham''' is an upcoming [[NPC]] that the Traveler meets in [[Port Ormos]], [[Sumeru]]. He is from the [[Haravatat]] in the [[Sumeru Akademiya]].

The side of what appears to be a {{Dendro}} [[Vision]] can be seen attached to the left shoulder of his clothes.
